titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend and improve certain authorities of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

bill.summary:
9/17/2007--Introduced.
Sets $25 million as the maximum amount per fiscal year for reimbursement to states and local agencies administering veterans' education benefits.
